entry.title: eClick first public release is out!
entry.summary:
eClick is a free wireless click-track system for musicians.

Downloads avaliable at: https://github.com/tarmoj/eclick/releases/tag/v0.1.1

See more: Getting started

Or watch a demo in youtube

Please keep in mind that the software is in development stadium and not recommended yet for mission-critical performances, still hopefully it is useful in many cases.

Please have also a look at known issues be active with giving feed-back and reporting bugs to improve the program! See Contributing
